showerReviews.reviewText: This location is an absolute disappointment. The Pilot app rarely works here, which forces customers to go inside just to reserve a shower. On top of that, be prepared for long waits because the place is consistently understaffed. Let‚Äôs be ‚Ä¶
Not the most spacious or comfortable Pilot, but I stopped in just for a shower.

The store was very clean, well maintained and stocked.
üõéÔ∏è Service
The store employees are very professional and friendly. ‚Ä¶

They take forever to clean showers here.
I had 7 people in front of me.I've been sitting for over a hour.
I still no shower. ‚Ä¶
The perfect truck stop, with everything that you need, good customer care service and ofcos, showers! That are cleaned regularly definitely worth the price.

Lots of parking
Did not see a dog park
Clean restrooms ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Honestly after seeing some negative comments on the showers, we were hesitant to stop at this location. Thankfully, we had a great experience! While the truck parking was completely full, we did get to snag a temporary parking area to come ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ NO HOT WATER IN SHOWERS ‚Ä¶

04-09-25
The store is in the process of renovating. New showers. Unfortunately, the cheap shower heads spoil so much efforts of renovating them.
Beaten up driveways. Outdated pump equipment, but always friendly customer service! ü§† ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a Love‚Äôs. Parking here can fill quickly. I usually park across the road at the road ranger and walk over to Love‚Äôs to use my free showers. There‚Äôs a sidewalk that connects the truck stops. It gets me a bit of exercise to walk briskly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of loves workers are just lazy and that's sad because the bathrooms look updated. I come into my shower nothing but hair on the sink floor and toilet. It doesn't even require much to just wipe and sanitize things for the next person. ‚Ä¶

HOT SHOWER!! I stopped at Loves #345 store to fuel, and the pump didn't work. I left there and came to this one, and everything was great. I'm not sure how there can be such a difference between different stores within the same chain

‚Ä¶ are my favorite travel stop when I'm out on the road I can get everything I need here including a hot shower propane clean windows with windshield washer fluid available and the folks here are so nice so kind and very hospitable love ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Diamond status every month. Loves is the only truckstop I fuel at. Pulled into this one today to get a quick shower and grab something to eat before I fuel and hit the road. I parked across from the cat scale in an open spot between 2 ‚Ä¶
Worst shower experience I‚Äôve ever had at a love I didn‚Äôt get to enjoy my shower it was barely warm to take a shower literally no hot water don‚Äôt ask for shower 4

Friendly Staff, Clean Showers, Fuel Pumps were clean & not busy, and parking was not a problem. I arrived 03/30/18 at 1915 and was parked & in my shower by 1930. The employees and the managers were all friendly and greeted me and they were ‚Ä¶

After a hot day of unloading FD the shower was heaven, great water pressure. I gave them four starts because there is no toilet in the shower room, it was cold when I went into the room, and though it was clean could use an update.  Don't ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . I decided to hang them up in my truck and refused to give the owner any more money on his extremely short cycle programmed machine. That was just a blip, but then I went to take a shower. Large bathrooms for the drivers shower. No ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs ok. You can always find parking so far, the showers could be better, there is really no place to put your things and I don‚Äôt care to use a shower curtain that everyone else has used, so water gets all over the floor. The ventilation is ‚Ä¶
Showers are awful. No shelfs to put your stuff. I really hate the shower curtains, no one want that to touch your body. Gross.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice stop, the shop is always nice and clean, the bathrooms are small so they can get nasty pretty fast. Staff is always pleasant and helpful, you will never have to wait in line.  Lots of selection for snacks and other goodies. Lots of ‚Ä¶

Open 24 Hours... that's a plus
Place has everything you need. Prices are a little high and the place could use some cleaning. 9:30pm..Two guys working the counter and trash cans are full and stuff on the floor. Both guys are on their phones watching videos and playing games.

Great place, wonderful food and plenty of over night parking. Scale is $8 and reweigh is only $1
Also have showers
The ladies are very nice üòä what an incredible friendly staff! Will be back for sure on my travels üôåüèª wide selection of snacks. Clean facilities üöΩ ‚Ä¶

The strawberries and cheese pies ARE AMAZING! ESPECIALLY WHEN THEN DEEP FRY THEM WITH THE SWEETCORN! The employees are kind and store is for the most part clean.(when super the bathrooms will get hit hard, but to be expected. Just let an ‚Ä¶
An awesome pitstop, large, open area for truck parking, clean store with friendly staff. They have Chester's fried chicken and plenty of grab-n-go hot food

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would ‚Ä¶

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this ‚Ä¶

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn‚Äôt clean at all and from the looks of it hasn‚Äôt been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn‚Äôt cleaning them, ‚Ä¶

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles ‚Ä¶
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* ‚Ä¶
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I‚Äôve ever been to. There‚Äôs soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago

Crazy large joint. Lots of stuff to buy that you don't need. I'd been on the road for three long days. It was nice to stop in and have a decent cup of coffee and a bagel. I didn't utilize their showers, but I've heard that they're very nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: What an awesome truck stop! Clean bathrooms & showers! (The towels in shower pik were ours) & laundry area. Great  restaurant! Clean, stocked & organized store. Lots of souvenirs & gifts. They make their own fudge right there & it‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Im fluffy, so I thought the shower stall itself was kind of small, BUT, it was one of THE CLEANEST showers Ive ever had on the road, and $8(!!!!!). The HOT water and water pressure were also on point. Ill be back for sure!
Great little truck stop. Absolutely spotless and well mannered staff. Definitely some of the most well prepared food on the road.  If you can believe it- $ 5 dollar shower  üöø ‚Ä¶
You can also wash here for free if you buy 50 gallons of diesel fuel. And if you buy a shower ticket for 8 dollars, it is inexpensive, for example, at other gas stations it costs 15 dollars.

OTR drives, plenty of parking.
Large lot.
Shower are AMbest
Cash 8$
Restaurant onsite
üëçüëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶
Nice truck parking, nice shower, old lady behind counter could use some customer service skills. Has post office and restaurant. Truck Wash was ok, not great. Mexican restaurant was good.

Ok place . Friendly people.. restaurant good.. showers old small and showerhead hangs almost at 5ft height. So for me at 6ft2 I have to shower on my knees..
Parking is ok

I am a female trainee. Walked in with my trainer he asked for a team shower.  The cashier gives us one. When he said something. She stated " what's the problem I gave you the big one"  problem is he is my trainer. So today I s hi powered ‚Ä¶
Pretty decent food. Clean place. Friendly girls at register. Shower was clean and cheap @ $8.00. Thank you!!
This is a great place to eat ,shower, fuel ,and Wi-Fi

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped for a 10 and shower. $8 for a shower. Water pressure was amazing. The 3 squares on the back are their own separate sprayers. 9/10. My only complaint is not having a fan in there for circulation. Shower 3 was clean. ‚Ä¶
This place is EXCELLENT!! Great customer service,  probably the best I've had in a long time. I took a shower there also & it was very clean.

‚Ä¶ . So was the Rum Raisin ice cream. I was offered a sample of all 8 flavors available at the time. Showers are $12. The shower I had, #4, was clean, has a bit of a view & has 3 streams in the shower that are controlled separately. It ‚Ä¶
Clean shower, and only 10 bucks! Friendly place and plenty of truck parking.  Great food!

This is a very clean truck stop. The toilets and showers are great. The showers are $8. You can experience a more luxurious shower than at major truck stops. The food at the restaurant next door was very delicious and the portions were more ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ do stop and have a look-see here. They have showers upstairs if you need a shower that have all the nozzles in the wall that is like a standing massage and it is Heavenly I'm telling you. The food is really really phenomenal and it's real ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ due to weather. We finally ordered breakfast and it was wonderful. Later that day we took showers, and OMG,best shower we have had on the road. After breakfast and showers we figured dinner was a good idea and it was!! I had a bacon ‚Ä¶
Best shower in the world. Seriously the best I've ever had. Had Polish Sausage and Sauerkraut special last night was very tasty and all I could eat. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the top of the Best truck stops across Great America. From the friendly personal at the fuel desk to the family style restaurant with great cooking...... and the showers are the BEST. Rather you just need fuel, eat or quick shower this is ‚Ä¶
Great diesel price for the state... 4/20/22 4.68/gal. Very trucker friendly also free shower plus beverage (50 gal min?) and 2 cent per gallon in store reward no card needed
